channel.title: Need Help with hosting
channel.description:
okay now im hosting with hamachi dont need a hoster just need some help to figure out how to get it hosted from computer so others can connect to it. Now i can use the client i got with the source correct? okay and other players will be able to use moparscapes webclient to connect? just post on here if you got skype add me soulsplit.staff-magepker12 or skypename: Kyle. not asking alot just need a little bit of help and will give good position on server if you can help me thanks :D
ps: yes im a noob at this it is my first server im trying to create. Please no negative comments on my question, if you can help please do so.

no sorry, I have to leave in just a minute… just post what problems you have and i’ll give you my most advanced attention, you may add my msn and i will try and do it some other time.

item.title: Need Help with hosting
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Kyle Pk Kyle
item.description:
@Pk_Kyle wrote:

Might you be able to “tv” me (teamview) and show me how its done? sorry to sound lazy lol but im kinda confused on this step.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with hosting
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

client folder<client.java<control+f search server =
you will find this when downloading the client: server = "127.0.0.1";
you need to make an account on no-ip.com and add a host, then put the host ip where 127.0.0.1 is, example: server = "example.no-ip.org";
And if your router hosting then you need to go onto your router and add it to your “portforwarding tab”= http://prntscr.com/2a9wu Yes is do understand all router will most likely look different but, im just showing an example ;p, now you need to add something close to this: http://prntscr.com/2a9x9 the ip’s will be different to figure out yours go to start<run…<cmd<type “ipconfig” and it will show your default gateway adress, (you put your ip4adress on your no-ip host) then go into gui.java and search “ip” and you will get something like: UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName()); sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("example.no-ip.org"));
change example.no-ip.org to your no-ip. and wallah. (i think xD) just started hosting myself. -might be abit different because this is with an router but, im sure there wouldn’t be much to change with hamachi if so, then just ignore this post…

Read full topic
